channel.title: cocktails on Tolar Town
channel.description: Recent content in cocktails on Tolar Town

item.title: New Orleans: bars
item.description: Me in the dungeon Adam Adam & Peter Amaro flight at Gianna’s A wedding party crashed our quiet cocktail hour at Jewel of the South.

item.title: Grace Cafe, Aunty Peg's, Whisky + Alement, Tonka
item.description: This morning, I had a scrumptious breakfast sandwich (the “Brekkie”) at Grace Cafe near my airbnb. Food and drink continue to amaze me in Melbourne in a way I haven’t seen so consistently well done across an entire city like this before. The eggs were light and fluffy and folded into a perfectly toasted ciabatta, with chives, cheese, sriracha mayo, onion jam. I met up with Taylor at Aunty Peg’s. We enjoyed a coffee cupping before enjoying some coffees at the bar.

item.title: Shandong Mama Mini, NGV, Ian Potter, Eau de Vie, Black Pearl, Capitano
item.description: I had a lunch of “Dill-icious” pork dumplings and garlic cucumber salad with a homemade lemon iced tea at Shandong Mama Mini. I walked down to the National Gallery of Victoria (NGV) International to see the KAWS exhibit, along with a few other things in the permanent collection, before heading to the NGV Ian Potter museum focused on Australian art. After the walking & the sight-seeing, I treated myself to some cocktails at Eau de Vie in the Central Business District and Black Pearl in Fitzroy.
